text: The Best British Forward award is an annual British ice hockey award made to the best British forward as voted for by members of Ice Hockey Journalists UK. The award was first made in 2003 and has since been won five times by Tony Hand and twice by Ashley Tait. ==Past winners== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- ! Season !! Winner !!
